text: Meriania maguirei is a species of plant in the family Melastomataceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist montane forests and subtropical or tropical high-altitude shrubland. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador maguirei Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Plants described in 1967
title: Meriania maguirei
